column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Great food and experience!  I have been wanting to dine here for a long time
column2: so we made a reservation with friends for dinner.  Great atmosphere
column3: excellent service(thank you James) and wonderful food.  Bone-in Ribeye was excellent.  Ordered it Medium +
column4: since did not want to risk a too red Medium rare. Appetizers and sides are designed to share. We ordered pear salad
column5: Caesar salad and shrimp cocktail to start.  For the sides
column7: wild mushrooms & Brussels sprouts were really good. Really enjoyed the time with friends and excellent food!
